AT.name: HarmoKnight™
AT.description: HarmoKnight verbindet seitwärts scrollendes Plattform-Gameplay mit rhythmischen Herausforderungen, wodurch ein aufregendes und vielseitiges Spielerlebnis entsteht. Jedes Level enthält Musik, die als Leitfaden dient. Anhand der Musik erkennt man beispielsweise wann Gegner angegriffen, Abgründe überwunden oder die musikalischen Pflanzen im Hintergrund getroffen werden können. Dank der intuitiven Zwei-Knopf-Steuerung lassen sich die Grundlagen des Spiels leicht erlernen … das heißt aber nicht, dass es ein Kinderspiel wird, Prinzessin Ariana aus den Fängen der Kakofonen zu befreien.

AU.name: HarmoKnight™
AU.description: HarmoKnight combines side-scrolling platforming with rhythm-action gameplay to create an exciting and colourful experience. Each stage has a musical track that must be used as a guide to perform specific moves such as hitting enemies, jumping gaps and striking musical plants in the background. Thanks to the game’s intuitive two-button control system, picking up the basics is really simple… but that doesn’t mean that saving Princess Ariana from the Noizoids is going to be easy!

BG.name: HarmoKnight™
BG.description: HarmoKnight combines side-scrolling platforming with rhythm-action gameplay to create an exciting and colourful experience. Each stage has a musical track that must be used as a guide to perform specific moves such as hitting enemies, jumping gaps and striking musical plants in the background. BE.name: HarmoKnight™
BE.description: HarmoKnight associe un gameplay de plateforme à défilement latéral à un gameplay de rythme et d'action pour créer une expérience passionnante et intense. Chaque niveau correspond à un morceau de musique qui sert de guide pour exécuter des coups précis comme frapper les ennemis, sauter par-dessus les trous et toucher les plantes musicales à l'arrière-plan. Grâce au système de commande intuitif à deux boutons, le jeu est facilement accessible... mais ce n'est pas pour autant que sauver la princesse Ariana des Discordoïdes sera chose aisée !

ES.name: HarmoKnight™
ES.description: HarmoKnight combina el juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral con una dinámica de juego repleta de ritmo y acción para crear una experiencia tan colorida como fascinante. Cada fase tiene su propio tema musical, que sirve como guía para ejecutar movimientos específicos tales como golpear a los enemigos, saltar agujeros o incluso atizar a algunas plantas musicales que decoran el entorno. Gracias al intuitivo sistema de control basado en el uso de dos botones, familiarizarse con el juego es muy sencillo… ¡pero eso no quiere decir que rescatar a la princesa Ariana de las garras de los disonoides vaya a ser pan comido!

IT.name: HarmoKnight™
IT.description: HarmoKnight combina il divertimento platform a scorrimento laterale con il gioco ritmico d'azione in un'esperienza coloratissima e divertente. Segui il ritmo della colonna sonora che accompagna ogni livello mentre esegui mosse specifiche come colpire i nemici, saltare i dirupi e colpire piante musicali. Grazie all'intuitivo sistema di controllo basato su due pulsanti, imparare a giocare è semplicissimo… ma questo non vuol dire che salvare la principessa Arianna dai Rumorozzi sarà una passeggiata!

NO.name: HarmoKnight™
NO.description: HarmoKnight combines side-scrolling platforming with rhythm-action gameplay to create an exciting and colourful experience. NL.name: HarmoKnight™
NL.description: HarmoKnight combineert zijwaarts scrollende platformactie met ritmeactie, waardoor een spannende en kleurrijke ervaring ontstaat. In elk level gebruik je een muziekstuk om te bepalen waar je bepaalde acties moet uitvoeren, zoals vijanden raken, over gaten springen en muzikale planten op de achtergrond activeren. De basis van het spel is simpel, omdat het een intuïtieve besturing met maar twee knoppen gebruikt. Maar dat betekent nog niet dat je prinses Ariana fluitend uit de klauwen van de Noizoids gaat redden!

NZ.name: HarmoKnight™
NZ.description: HarmoKnight combines side-scrolling platforming with rhythm-action gameplay to create an exciting and colourful experience. Each stage has a musical track that must be used as a guide to perform specific moves such as hitting enemies, jumping gaps and striking musical plants in the background. Thanks to the game’s intuitive two-button control system, picking up the basics is really simple… but that doesn’t mean that saving Princess Ariana from the Noizoids is going to be easy!

PL.name: HarmoKnight™
PL.description: HarmoKnight combines side-scrolling platforming with rhythm-action gameplay to create an exciting and colourful experience. Each stage has a musical track that must be used as a guide to perform specific moves such as hitting enemies, jumping gaps and striking musical plants in the background. Thanks to the game’s intuitive two-button control system, picking up the basics is really simple… but that doesn’t mean that saving Princess Ariana from the Noizoids is going to be easy!

PT.name: HarmoKnight™
PT.description: HarmoKnight combina elementos de plataformas de deslocação lateral com ação e ritmo para oferecer uma experiência emocionante e colorida. Cada nível contém uma faixa musical que deve ser usada como guia para efetuar jogadas específicas como atingir inimigos, saltar sobre fendas e acertar em plantas musicais no fundo. Graças ao intuitivo sistema de controlo de dois botões do jogo, é muito fácil apreender as noções básicas, mas isso não significa que salvar a princesa Ariana dos Noizoids vá ser fácil...

RU.name: HarmoKnight™
RU.description: Игра HarmoKnight объединяет в себе черты двумерного платформера с ритмичным игровым процессом, оставляя о себе яркие впечатления. На каждом уровне играет своя музыкальная композиция, под ритм который вы выполняете определенные действия — бьете врагов, перепрыгиваете пропасти и наносите удары по музыкальным растениям на заднем плане. Благодаря интуитивно понятному двухкнопочному управлению разобраться в основах игры не просто, а очень просто... но это не значит, что так же просто будет спасти принцессу Ariana от Noizoids!

SE.description: HarmoKnight combines side-scrolling platforming with rhythm-action gameplay to create an exciting and colourful experience. Each stage has a musical track that must be used as a guide to perform specific moves such as hitting enemies, jumping gaps and striking musical plants in the background.
